ai-tha-ap326:2.4_0: for the sake of sacrifices and others,
ai-tha-ap326:3.1_0: like rushing on a dry land.
ai-tha-ap326:3.3_0: like the sun shining in the stomach.
ai-tha-ap326:3.4_0: like the moon in the waxing fortnight.
ai-tha-ap326:4.3_0: Having gone to attachment, the Awakened One
ai-tha-ap326:4.4_0: this is the word of the words.
ai-tha-ap326:5.2_0: and the princes plunged into my womb.
ai-tha-ap326:6.3_0: views, and insistence in this very life.
ai-tha-ap326:6.4_0: these things are praised by the astute,
ai-tha-ap326:8.2_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap326:10.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap326:10.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap326:10.4_0: this fruit is the perception of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap326:12.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sacrifice.
ai-tha-ap326:13.1_0: the fourth Elder Nuns of Sacrifice
